SMW Subobject for UnchargedHigh Alchemy value: 600Buy limit: 40Examine: Fill it with firelighters to make pretty fire.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Gnomish firelighterImage: File:Gnomish firelighter.pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.035Value: 1000Version anchor: UnchargedRelease date: 6 July 2016Item ID: 20275

The gnomish firelighter is an item obtainable by completing medium Treasure Trails. It may be charged with any one colour of gnomish firelighters at a time. It also increases the chance of a log to be successfully burned, additionally giving an extra 10 Firemaking experience per log when charged.

The maximum number of charges is 1,000.

While charged, it can be used with any set of standard logs in the same manner as one would use a tinderbox with any other set of logs to produce the same colour of fire as the firelighters it is charged with. One charge is used up for every coloured fire created.

If another colour is desired, one may simply uncharge the firelighter at any time; this will return any unused firelighters and free the device up to be charged with another style of firelighter.

Gnomish firelighters do not function as a tinderbox when out of charges, and only standard logs may be used to create coloured fires.

Despite being a unique Treasure Trails reward, the gnomish firelighter cannot be stored in a POH Treasure Chest.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Reward casket (medium)N/A 11/341

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • There is a portrait of a gnome child on the lid of the gnome firelighter.

[[File:Gnomish firelighter detail.png|left|180px]]
The '''gnomish firelighter''' is an item obtainable by completing [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It may be charged with any one colour of [[gnomish firelighters]] at a time. It also increases the chance of a log to be successfully burned, additionally giving an extra 10 Firemaking experience per log when charged.

The maximum number of charges is 1,000.

While charged, it can be used with any set of standard [[logs]] in the same manner as one would use a [[tinderbox]] with any other set of logs to produce the same colour of [[fire]] as the firelighters it is charged with. One charge is used up for every coloured fire created.

If another colour is desired, one may simply uncharge the firelighter at any time; this will return any unused firelighters and free the device up to be charged with another style of firelighter.

Gnomish firelighters do '''not''' function as a tinderbox when out of charges, and only standard logs may be used to create coloured fires.

Despite being a unique Treasure Trails reward, the gnomish firelighter cannot be stored in a POH Treasure Chest.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Gnomish firelighter}}

==Trivia==
*There is a portrait of a [[gnome child]] on the lid of the gnome firelighter.

{{Medium clue rewards}}
